content: my crochet sugar glider pattern is designed to produce a cute crochet toy that is still instantly recognizable as the uniquely fabulous sugar glider you will be working with variegated gray pink white and a little bit of black dk yarn and a 3 75mm crochet hook here s what you will need to crochet a sugar glider like mine gray variegated yarn pink dk yarn black dk yarn white dk yarn 3 75mm crochet hook steel yarn needle stitch markers toy stuffing large safety eyes for the main body i used stylecraft s batik yarn in the graphite color tones the black markings were paton s charcoal dk yarn and the white and pink areas were from my old yarn stash however i m confident the pink was a women s institute dk yarn and the white was merino wool textured any dk yarn will work for this pattern with a 3 75mm crochet hook if you use a different weighted yarn make sure all the colors are the same type and that you choose your crochet hook based on the notes on the packaging find the full pattern on lucy kate crochet website
